animeDescription: Four additional short stories of the Steel Angels: Saki becomes a film actress, Karinka goes on a blind date with Kamihito, Kurumi practices the art of becoming a traditional Japanese woman, and the rest of the Steel Angels engage in a contest to win Nakahito's heart.   (Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Enomoto, Atsuko', 'Kurata, Masayo', 'Tanaka, Rie', 'Kuwashima, Houko', 'Matsumoto, Yasunori', 'Suzuoki, Hirotaka', 'Tezuka, Chiharu', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki']
